Product Description

Esur Home Office Desk Black Decor – Inspirational Farmhouse Wooden Box Sign Gifts

The sign reads “everything is figureoutable” and is a reminder to think positively! Keep your thoughts positive and be encouraging in your workplace or workspace.

This box sign measures 8 x 4 inches and is made of solid wood MDF, Simple, classic design durable and lightweight with a hollowed out back sanded for a distressed look.

Crafted modern farmhouse office decor, adds warmth and gives it a vintage look that adds to a country or rustic home decor theme, A great reminder and additional to any desk, shelf, or any decor aesthetic.

Makes a Great Gift – The stylish and inspirational box sign makes unusual gift for almost any occasion for your friends or family, co-workers and more.

Orgone is the fundamental of all life in the environment, which we also call ‘chi’ or ‘prana’ in various cultures. But the basic concept remains the same. It is the element of life and all energy that moves this planet. Ever Vibes brings to you New Inspirational Orgonite Pyramid that is made from the crystal Rainbow Moonstone to shower success and prosperity in your life. Apart from offering calmness and serenity in your life, this orgonite pyramid will also protect you against harmful EMF radiation from the electronic devices around you. This beautiful pyramid is perfect to harmonize your energies and align your chakras in an ideal way.

Rainbow Moonstone For Intuition, Dreams, & Positive Energy

This pyramid is embedded with the Rainbow Moonstone which encourages hope, sensitivity, intuition, and psychic abilities. It is also well versed in balancing people’s masculine and feminine energies. It brings abundance and success to the user. It also helps in regulating a healthy sleep cycle and increase overall calmness for better mental health.

Features :

Protection from EMFs

We are constantly surrounded by electromagnetic frequencies coming from all the electronic devices around us. These are cell phones, laptops, microwaves, televisions, etc. These harmful radiations can be damaging for the human body. Having this pyramid near you will help to shield you from EMF frequencies, thereby promoting healthy life.

Assists in Leading a Healthy Life

This Orgonite Pyramid consisting of Rainbow Moonstone will benefit women by balancing their hormonal and menstrual cycles. It also provides inner growth and strength that helps you to lead a healthy life. With the help of this pyramid, you will be able to make decisions that take you forward in your journey towards fitness.

Ideal for Achieving Emotional Equilibrium

With the Rainbow Moonstone, you can find a true state of emotional calm. For men with a temper and troubling mental states, this pyramid will help them calm their masculine energy and find peace. With a proper emotional balance between your masculine and feminine side, you will find decision making and going through daily life easier.

An Ideal Stone For Chakra Healing

Rainbow Moonstone is a crystal that is considered to be ideal for meditation. The vibrational frequencies of this stone can facilitate a smooth transition into a deeper meditative state. By activating the Crown chakra, this crystal helps to bring loving and blissful energies from the beyond into your body to promote emotional well-being. This pyramid is ideal to boost your creativity and enhance your vision when it comes to fulfilling your goals.

item.title: Inspirational Sports Stories for Young Readers: How 12 World-Class Athletes Overcame Challenges and Rose to the Top
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Are you looking for the perfect book for the young sports fan in your life? Are you hoping to find a book that can both engage your child as well as teach them valuable life lessons? This book is the compromise you’ve been looking for with life stories of some ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $3.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 02:19:27 UTC – Details)

Are you looking for the perfect book for the young sports fan in your life?

Are you hoping to find a book that can both engage your child as well as teach them valuable life lessons?

This book is the compromise you’ve been looking for with life stories of some of the most famous athletes of all time. We discuss all of the challenges they faced in life and how those obstacles made them stronger and the person they became. We cover every sport from football, baseball and basketball to gymnastics and surfing. This book will engage every young sports fan as they learn about their favorite current stars as well as some of the most influential athletes of the past.

Inspirational Sports Stories for Young Readers is the perfect gift for the sports-obsessed child in your life.

This book features the following:

12 inspirational sports stories of your favorite athletesQuotes from each of the athletes on what their struggles meant to them personallyNew information that largely goes untold when talking about each athleteRemarkable illustrations of each athlete throughout the chapters.

This book celebrates the history of sports by highlighting not only some of the greatest athletes of all time but also the struggles that made them who they are today. It focuses less on the accomplishments of the athletes on the field or the court, but the journey to their success and how that can inspire your child in the classroom and in life.

We leave no sport untouched as we drift between popular sports like basketball and football into the more unheralded sports like track and field and boxing. If nothing else, your child will have a greater appreciation for the history of sports and learn about some new icons of their day.

For every parent, this book gives you the opportunity to teach life lessons to your child in a new light. You can use this book as the background for larger life talks about perseverance and commitment. You can use these athletes as examples of people who beat the odds to become the famous athletes they became.

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BLGJV5BR
Publisher ‏ : ‎ Red Panda Press (November 4, 2022)
Language ‏ : ‎ English
Paperback ‏ : ‎ 120 pages
ISBN-13 ‏ : ‎ 979-8887680125
Item Weight ‏ : ‎ 6.1 ounces
Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6 x 0.28 x 9 inches

INSPIRATIONAL WALL ART: Our unframed motivational quotes wall decor is originally designed to create a joyful and positive atmosphere in Office, Bedroom, Living Room, Gym, Class. Botanical plant design makes this black and white art more elegant and beautiful; you will be completely in love with the way they look, starting your day in a good mood when you are looking at this simple inspirational wall art.
QUALITY PRINT: Laser printing process, these motivational wall art sets are clearly displayed on bright white card stock paper, feature clean design and high resolution; botanical watercolor designs printed on 400 GSM sturdy, white stiff card stock with a high gloss UV coating. They are vibrant, durable, and dust resistant for long-term use.
UNFRAMED: Please note that our art sets come UNFRAMED. You get a set of four 8″x 10″ Prints, so you can choose the perfect frames to match your own style and the room decoration. Our inspiration art will fit well in your standard 8″ x 10″ frames without mat or larger frames with 8″ x 10″ mat. Framed or hung with clips are also great ways to show off your beautiful prints.
EASY & THOUGHTFUL GIFT: Our positive affirmations wall art prints are packaged with beautiful and high-quality Gift Packaging to make them ready to give and to protect your arts from any possible damage in transit. They are perfect gifts for you loved one. Please enjoy these little things!
ORIGINAL DESIGN: We are here to provide you with original and creative designs to light up your room, remind you of the beautiful sparkles in life with these pretty prints. It will be the perfect addition to your office, bedroom, class.
